task.title: Connecting to the Virginia Tech server/Wi-Fi
task.shortdesc: Need to connect to the Internet when renting with AirClassroom? Here's how!

taskbody.context: You will need a temporary username and password when logging in to the Virginia Tech server.

step.cmd: Log in to your AirClassroom account
In "Connecting to the Network", select "Obtain Temporary Login"
Select the reservation you would like access to the VT server/Wi-Fi during

taskbody.result: After confirming this information, we will send you a username and password that you will use to log in to the Virginia Tech server/Wi-Fi. This login information will only be valid during your reservation and only for the duration of your reservation. Each time you request access to the network for a different reservation, we will provide you with a unique username and password. This is done to protect Virginia Tech's server and prevent overloading.
taskbody.postreq: Once you log in with your network username and password, all of the computers in the classroom will have access to the Virginia Tech server and Wi-Fi for the duration of your reservation.
